title: U.S. and French Declarations and private property

content.question: The United States Declaration of Independence and the French Declaration of the Rights of Man and Citizen reflect a shared concern for

choices.label: physical elimination of the ruling class

topic.text: 5.2: Nationalism and Revolutions in the Period from 1750 to 1900

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
